oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans (UCV) reunion pins, flag, and medallions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Box of UCV reunion medallions. Birmingham, 1916, 26th reunion; Montgomery, 1931, 41st reunion; Macon, Georgia, 1912, 22nd reunion; Confederate flag pin; tiny Confederate flag pin; delegate UCV 38th reunion, May 8-11, 1928 in Arkansas; UCV reunion, 1934, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga, delegate to American Legion.
